paragraphs.text:
import scala.io.Source

val s = Source.fromFile("/home/hadoop/alice-in-wonderland.txt")
val result = s.getLines.toSeq
    .flatMap(_.split(" "))
    .filter(_ != "")
    .groupBy(x => x)
    .mapValues(_.size)
    .toSeq
    .sortBy(-_._2)
